casebody.data:
[Cite as 12/31/2002 Case Announcements #2, 2002-Ohio-7367.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 31, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-1841. State ex rel. Kroger Co. v. Robinette.

Franklin App. No. 01AP-1319, 2002-Ohio-4777. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to stay briefing schedule to pursue settlement pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6XC),

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted and appellant’s brief shall be filed on or before January 29, 2003.
